ai_perfect_reasons: Geographic flow optimized: Moalboal first, then Cebu City, minimizing backtracking.
Interests covered: All activities align with user's preferences for Beach, Diving, and Nature.
Budget adherence: Strict adherence to the ₹55000 (in-country) budget and breakdown percentages.
Realistic pacing: Mix of action-packed and leisurely days to avoid burnout.
Detailed & actionable: Specific place names, accurate costs, and practical tips for each activity.
cultural_etiquette: Always greet locals with a smile and 'Mabuhay' (welcome/long live).
Dress modestly when visiting churches or local villages.
It's customary to offer a small tip for good service, though not always expected.
Always ask for permission before taking photos of people.
Respect marine life; do not touch corals or feed fish during snorkeling/diving.
image_keyword: Moalboal sardine run, Kawasan Falls canyoneering, Pescador Island
important_tips: Purchase a local SIM card (Globe or Smart) upon arrival for easy navigation and communication.
Download offline maps of Cebu and Moalboal before you arrive.
Stay hydrated by drinking plenty of bottled water.
Be aware of your surroundings, especially in crowded areas.
Inform your bank about your travel plans to avoid card issues.

accommodation.booking_tip: Book directly on their website for potential discounts or package deals.
accommodation.name: Moalboal Tropics
accommodation.why_this: Good value, close to Panagsama Beach and dive shops, with a pool for relaxation.

activities.description: Arrive at CEB, clear immigration, and collect luggage. Head to the South Bus Terminal for your onward journey.
activities.google_maps_search_query: Mactan-Cebu International Airport, Lapu-Lapu City, Cebu, Philippines
activities.how_to_reach: Flight from Manila (approx. 1.5 hrs, 2750 PHP), then Grab taxi to South Bus Terminal (300 PHP, 45 min).
activities.local_secret: Take a Grab taxi from the airport to the South Bus Terminal to avoid overcharging by regular taxis.
activities.tips: Have some small PHP bills ready for transport.
activities.why_this_fits: Essential first step for your nature and beach adventure, setting the stage for Moalboal.

activities.description: Board a Ceres Liner bus from Cebu South Bus Terminal to Moalboal. Enjoy the scenic coastal drive.
activities.google_maps_search_query: Cebu South Bus Terminal, Cebu City, Cebu, Philippines
activities.how_to_reach: Bus from Cebu South Bus Terminal (200 PHP, 3 hrs).
activities.local_secret: Sit on the left side of the bus for ocean views during the journey.
activities.tips: Buses are air-conditioned; bring a light jacket.
activities.why_this_fits: Efficient and budget-friendly way to reach Moalboal, allowing you to see local life.

activities.description: Enjoy fresh seafood and local Filipino dishes with a view of the ocean at Panagsama Beach.
activities.google_maps_search_query: Lantaw Restaurant, Panagsama Beach, Moalboal, Cebu, Philippines
activities.local_secret: Try their grilled tuna belly, a local specialty, often caught fresh daily.
activities.tips: Go early to catch the sunset views.
activities.why_this_fits: A perfect introduction to Moalboal's culinary scene after a day of travel, aligning with your beach interest.

itinerary.afternoon_summary: Scenic bus ride to Moalboal, checking into accommodation.
itinerary.daily_weather_tip: Expect warm, humid weather. Wear light clothing and stay hydrated.
itinerary.evening_summary: Relax by the beach, enjoy a local dinner.
itinerary.morning_summary: Arrive at Mactan-Cebu International Airport (CEB) and transfer to the South Bus Terminal.
itinerary.notes: Focus on smooth arrival and settling into Moalboal's relaxed pace.
itinerary.stay_logic: Strategic location near dive sites and beach.
itinerary.theme: Transition from city bustle to coastal calm.

accommodation.booking_tip: Book directly on their website for potential discounts or package deals.
accommodation.name: Moalboal Tropics
accommodation.why_this: Good value, close to Panagsama Beach and dive shops, with a pool for relaxation.

activities.description: Witness millions of sardines forming mesmerizing bait balls just meters from the shore. Experience a discovery dive among them for an unforgettable nature experience.
activities.google_maps_search_query: Panagsama Beach, Moalboal, Cebu, Philippines
activities.how_to_reach: Walk from accommodation (5 min) to a local dive shop.
activities.local_secret: Go early in the morning for fewer crowds and better light for underwater photos.
activities.tips: Avoid touching the sardines or corals. Listen carefully to your dive instructor.
activities.why_this_fits: Directly caters to your interest in diving and nature, offering a unique marine spectacle.

activities.description: Enjoy a hearty breakfast at your hotel to fuel up for a day of adventure.
activities.google_maps_search_query: Moalboal Tropics, Panagsama Road, Moalboal, Cebu, Philippines
activities.local_secret: Ask for local fruit options like ripe mangoes or bananas, often fresh and delicious.
activities.tips: Check with the hotel if breakfast is included or à la carte.
activities.why_this_fits: Convenient and energizing start to your day, ensuring you're ready for nature and diving activities.

activities.description: Enjoy healthy and refreshing smoothie bowls and light meals perfect before or after an adventure.
activities.google_maps_search_query: Shaka Moalboal, Panagsama Road, Moalboal, Cebu, Philippines
activities.local_secret: Their 'Bom Dia' bowl is a local favorite, packed with fresh fruits and superfoods.
activities.tips: Great vegetarian and vegan options available.
activities.why_this_fits: A quick, nutritious meal to fuel up for canyoneering, keeping you energized for nature exploration.

activities.description: Jump, slide, and swim through the stunning turquoise waters of the Badian canyons, culminating in the majestic Kawasan Falls. An adrenaline-pumping nature experience.
activities.google_maps_search_query: Kawasan Falls, Badian, Cebu, Philippines
activities.how_to_reach: Tour pick-up from Moalboal accommodation (included in tour cost, 30 min drive).
activities.local_secret: Book with a reputable local guide to ensure safety and get the best experience, often including lunch.
activities.tips: Wear sturdy water shoes. Don't bring valuables unless in a dry bag.
activities.why_this_fits: Perfect for your nature and adventure interests, offering an immersive experience in Cebu's lush landscapes.

activities.activity: Dinner at The French Coffee Shop
activities.description: Enjoy a cozy dinner with a mix of French and Filipino comfort food in a relaxed setting.
activities.google_maps_search_query: The French Coffee Shop, Panagsama Road, Moalboal, Cebu, Philippines
activities.local_secret: Their homemade pastries and strong coffee are excellent for a morning treat too.
activities.tips: They also have good breakfast options if you want to try it another day.
activities.why_this_fits: A comforting meal after an active day, offering a different culinary experience near your beach base.

itinerary.afternoon_summary: Embark on an exhilarating canyoneering adventure at Kawasan Falls.
itinerary.daily_weather_tip: Wear quick-dry clothing and bring a waterproof bag for canyoneering.
itinerary.evening_summary: Relaxed dinner after an adventurous day.
itinerary.morning_summary: Experience a discovery dive with millions of sardines just off Panagsama Beach.
itinerary.notes: An intense but rewarding day of Moalboal's best adventures.
itinerary.theme: Thrilling aquatic adventures and natural wonders.

accommodation.booking_tip: Book directly on their website for potential discounts or package deals.
accommodation.name: Moalboal Tropics
accommodation.why_this: Good value, close to Panagsama Beach and dive shops, with a pool for relaxation.

activities.description: Start your day with a delicious breakfast at your hotel before heading out for island adventures.
activities.google_maps_search_query: Moalboal Tropics, Panagsama Road, Moalboal, Cebu, Philippines
activities.local_secret: Their coffee is freshly brewed and a great pick-me-up before diving.
activities.tips: Check with the hotel if breakfast is included or à la carte.
activities.why_this_fits: Convenient and energizing start to your day, ensuring you're ready for marine exploration.

activities.description: Take a boat trip to Pescador Island, known for its vibrant coral reefs and diverse marine life. Enjoy two guided dives around the island's famous 'Cathedral' cave.
activities.google_maps_search_query: Pescador Island, Moalboal, Cebu, Philippines
activities.how_to_reach: Boat departs from Panagsama Beach (walk from accommodation, 5 min).
activities.local_secret: Ask your boatman to also stop at Turtle Point near Panagsama Beach for guaranteed turtle sightings.
activities.tips: Bring water and snacks for the boat trip. Ensure your dive gear is checked.
activities.why_this_fits: Directly aligns with your diving and nature interests, showcasing Moalboal's rich marine biodiversity.

activities.description: Casual beachfront restaurant offering Filipino and international dishes, perfect for a post-diving meal.
activities.google_maps_search_query: Chili Bar, Panagsama Beach, Moalboal, Cebu, Philippines
activities.local_secret: Their fresh fruit shakes are incredibly refreshing after a morning in the sun.
activities.tips: Enjoy the ocean breeze and lively atmosphere.
activities.why_this_fits: Convenient and relaxed dining experience right by the beach, fitting your beach interest.

activities.description: Spend the afternoon relaxing on the pristine white sands of Basdaku Beach, swimming in its calm waters, or simply enjoying the sun.
activities.google_maps_search_query: Basdaku White Beach, Moalboal, Cebu, Philippines
activities.how_to_reach: Tricycle from Panagsama Beach (150 PHP, 15 min).
activities.local_secret: Head to the far ends of the beach for more secluded spots away from the main crowds.
activities.tips: There are local vendors selling snacks and drinks.
activities.why_this_fits: Offers a perfect blend of relaxation and beach enjoyment, a key interest for you.

activities.description: A popular spot for delicious and affordable Filipino and Western dishes in a friendly atmosphere.
activities.google_maps_search_query: Little Corner Restaurant, Panagsama Road, Moalboal, Cebu, Philippines
activities.local_secret: Their adobo and sinigang are highly recommended for an authentic taste of Filipino cuisine.
activities.tips: Can get busy, so arrive a bit earlier for dinner.
activities.why_this_fits: A great local dining experience to round off a day of beach and nature, offering variety.

itinerary.afternoon_summary: Relax on White Beach, swim, and sunbathe.
itinerary.daily_weather_tip: Apply sunscreen frequently, especially during island hopping.
itinerary.morning_summary: Boat trip to Pescador Island for diving and snorkeling.
itinerary.notes: A balanced day of marine exploration and beach relaxation.
itinerary.stay_logic: Continued stay in Moalboal for convenience.
itinerary.theme: Underwater exploration and serene beach time.

accommodation.booking_tip: Look for deals on online travel agencies for better rates.
accommodation.name: RedDoorz Plus @ Mabolo Cebu
accommodation.why_this: Centrally located, good value for money, and convenient for airport access the next day.

activities.description: Enjoy your last breakfast in Moalboal before heading back to Cebu City.
activities.google_maps_search_query: Moalboal Tropics, Panagsama Road, Moalboal, Cebu, Philippines
activities.local_secret: Their fresh fruit juices are a great way to start the day.
activities.tips: Check out from your hotel before leaving for Cebu City.
activities.why_this_fits: A convenient and satisfying meal before a travel day, ensuring you're ready for the journey.

activities.activity: Bus from Moalboal to Cebu City
activities.description: Take a Ceres Liner bus from Moalboal back to Cebu South Bus Terminal.
activities.google_maps_search_query: Moalboal Bus Stop, Moalboal, Cebu, Philippines
activities.how_to_reach: Tricycle to Moalboal bus stop (50 PHP, 5 min), then bus.
activities.local_secret: Buses are frequent; no need to book in advance.
activities.tips: Try to get an early bus to maximize your time in Cebu City.
activities.why_this_fits: Efficient and economical way to transition from Moalboal's nature to Cebu City's cultural sites.

activities.description: Experience a unique open-air BBQ food court where you choose your skewers and they're grilled fresh.
activities.google_maps_search_query: Larsian BBQ, Fuente Osmeña, Cebu City, Cebu, Philippines
activities.how_to_reach: Taxi/Grab from South Bus Terminal (100 PHP, 15 min).
activities.local_secret: Don't miss trying the 'puso' (hanging rice) that perfectly complements the grilled meats.
activities.tips: Be prepared for a smoky atmosphere and communal seating.
activities.why_this_fits: A vibrant local culinary experience, offering a taste of Cebuano street food culture.

activities.activity: Magellan's Cross & Basilica Minore del Santo Niño
activities.description: Visit the iconic Magellan's Cross, planted by Ferdinand Magellan in 1521, and the adjacent Basilica Minore del Santo Niño, home to the oldest religious relic in the Philippines.
activities.google_maps_search_query: Magellan's Cross, P. Burgos St, Cebu City, Cebu, Philippines
activities.how_to_reach: Walk from Larsian BBQ (15 min) or short taxi/Grab (80 PHP, 5 min).
activities.local_secret: The ceiling murals inside the Basilica are stunning; take time to admire them.
activities.tips: Dress modestly (shoulders and knees covered) when entering the Basilica.
activities.why_this_fits: Offers a glimpse into the historical and cultural heart of Cebu, enriching your understanding of the destination.

activities.activity: Dinner at Golden Cowrie Native Restaurant
activities.description: Savor traditional Filipino dishes served in a native, festive ambiance. Known for its authentic flavors.
activities.google_maps_search_query: Golden Cowrie Native Restaurant, Salinas Dr, Cebu City, Cebu, Philippines
activities.local_secret: Their Crispy Pata (deep-fried pork hock) and Kinilaw (ceviche) are must-tries.
activities.tips: It's a popular spot, so expect a lively atmosphere.
activities.why_this_fits: A delightful culinary experience to conclude your cultural exploration of Cebu City.

itinerary.afternoon_summary: Discover Cebu's rich history at Magellan's Cross and Basilica Minore del Santo Niño.
itinerary.daily_weather_tip: Wear comfortable walking shoes, as you'll be exploring historical sites.
itinerary.morning_summary: Travel back to Cebu City from Moalboal.
itinerary.notes: A day blending travel and cultural immersion in Cebu City.
itinerary.stay_logic: Proximity to airport for next day's departure.

activities.activity: Breakfast at RedDoorz Plus @ Mabolo Cebu
activities.description: Enjoy a final breakfast at your hotel, perhaps trying a local 'silog' dish (fried rice, egg, and meat).
activities.google_maps_search_query: RedDoorz Plus @ Mabolo Cebu, Mabolo, Cebu City, Cebu, Philippines
activities.local_secret: Many local cafes offer 'pandesal' (Filipino bread rolls) with coffee, a simple but delicious breakfast.
activities.tips: Check out time from hotel.
activities.why_this_fits: A relaxed start to your departure day, savoring local flavors one last time.

activities.description: Take a taxi or Grab to Mactan-Cebu International Airport for your flight back to Manila/onward journey.
activities.google_maps_search_query: Mactan-Cebu International Airport, Lapu-Lapu City, Cebu, Philippines
activities.local_secret: Allow extra time during peak hours as traffic to the airport can be heavy.
activities.tips: Confirm your flight terminal beforehand.
activities.why_this_fits: Essential for a smooth departure, ensuring you have enough time for check-in and security.

itinerary.daily_weather_tip: Check your flight status and allow ample time for airport transfer.
itinerary.morning_summary: Enjoy a final Filipino breakfast, head to the airport.

money_saving_hacks: Eat at local eateries (carinderias) for authentic and affordable Filipino meals.
Opt for public transport like buses or jeepneys for inter-city travel instead of private vans.
Bring your own snorkeling gear if possible to save on rental costs.
Buy snacks and drinks from local supermarkets rather than convenience stores or tourist shops.
Look for guesthouses or homestays instead of hotels for accommodation.
overall_vibe: You will dive into the vibrant underwater world of Moalboal, experiencing thrilling sardine runs and stunning coral gardens. This trip promises a blend of adventure and relaxation, allowing you to connect with nature's raw beauty and unwind on pristine beaches.
packing_tips: Swimwear, rash guard, and quick-dry towels.
Water shoes or sandals for rocky beaches and canyoneering.
Underwater camera or waterproof phone pouch.
Basic first-aid kit (band-aids, antiseptic, pain relievers).
smart_insights: Book domestic flights (Manila-Cebu) well in advance for better rates, especially if traveling during peak season.
Moalboal's peak season (December-May) means higher crowds and prices; consider shoulder seasons (June, November) for a balance.
Always carry cash (PHP) as many smaller establishments, especially in Moalboal, prefer it and ATMs can be scarce.
Sun protection is crucial; the tropical sun is intense, even on cloudy days.
Negotiate prices for tricycles and local tours, but always be respectful.

travel_between_cities.booking: Book via airline website (e.g., Cebu Pacific, Philippine Airlines) 1-2 months in advance.
travel_between_cities.tips: Arrive at the airport at least 2 hours before departure for domestic flights.

travel_between_cities.booking: Book via airline website (e.g., Cebu Pacific, Philippine Airlines) 1-2 months in advance.
travel_between_cities.tips: Allow extra time for transfer to Mactan-Cebu International Airport due to potential traffic.

trip_title: Philippines Coastal Charm: Moalboal's Reefs & Falls
validation_warnings: Some activities may have generic names (e.g.: Dinner at Lantaw Restaurant, Relaxation at White Beach (Basdaku Beach), Dinner at Little Corner Restaurant). For more specific recommendations, try providing more detailed preferences.
Note: Individual day costs sum to ₹29,080, which differs from the stated total of ₹54,999. Transport between cities may account for this difference.
